txt.en: 'With the recovery of the chain-links, I have no doubt that the Dievlig are indeed complicit in the raising of the wights here in the Bonevales. This must not be allowed to continue.\n\n'Return to Naeglanc at Echad Naeglanc, south and west of here. He will wish to know what we have learned.'

'While the attack by the Dievlig was unexpected, I fear that I must agree with Ilar: these chains confirm that Treh√©arn Brenin is complicit in these actions.\n\n'One of our allies, Lhucu, is actually his daughter, and I now fear for her safety.'
Your investigation of the wights uncovered evidence that the Dievlig are complicit in the raising of the wights in the Bonevales.
Talk to Naeglanc at Echad Naeglanc in the Bonevales
Naeglanc is at Echad Naeglanc, south and west of Ilar's camp.\n\nIlar told you to bring word of your discoveries to Naeglanc.
